      • realms

        RealmProvider realms()
        Returns a managed provider instance. Will start a provider transaction. This transaction is managed by the KeycloakSession transaction.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if transaction is not active

      • sessions

        UserSessionProvider sessions()
        Returns a managed provider instance. Will start a provider transaction. This transaction is managed by the KeycloakSession transaction.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if transaction is not active

      • close

        void close()

      • users

        UserFederationManager users()
        Possibly both cached and federated view of users depending on configuration.
        Returns:

      • userStorage

        UserProvider userStorage()
        Keycloak user storage. Non-federated, but possibly cache (if it is on) view of users.

      • scripting

        ScriptingProvider scripting()
        Keycloak scripting support.
